column2: Learn New Discipline via Favor
You need a lot of saved gold and prestige along with a favor from someone to learn a discipline from them.  You may only use this once every 50 years.
Stop New Discipline via Favor
This will stop you attempting to learn a new discipline via favor.
Learn Animalism from [Root.GetFirstName]
Learn Animalism from [Root.GetFirstName] in exchange for gold and a favor.
